products.name: Leaf Blower
products.description: A tool used to keep leaves and other types of debris off your lawn.

products.name: Edging Tool
products.description: A tool used to keep the edges of your lawn looking sharp and tidy

products.name: Gloves
products.description: A pair of hardy gloves to protect your hands.

products.name: Hoe
products.description: A tool used to break up soil and dirt.

products.name: Lawn Mower
products.description: A push lawn mower perfect for keeping your lawn nice and short.

products.name: Mulch
products.description: A bag of quality brown mulch for flowerbeds or any other part of your yard that isn't covered in grass.

products.name: Pot
products.description: A 28 inch flower pot perfect for large outdoor flowers.

products.name: Secateurs
products.description: A tool that makes cutting and trimming things a breeze.

products.name: Roll of Sod
products.description: A roll of sod ready to be laid out over any bare patches of ground in your yard. Sold in 2 feet by 6 feet rolls.

products.name: Spade
